name: $connectivity
desc: Returns: The entity that links the sugar residues together should also be captured for nearly all naturally occurring nucleic acid the linkage is a phosphate group. For many synthetic oligonucleotides phosphorothioate linkages are often seen. Linkage connectivity is assumed to be 3’-5’. If the linkage is either 3’-3’ or 5’-5’ this should be specified.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The entity that links the sugar residues together should also be captured for nearly all naturally occurring nucleic acid the linkage is a phosphate group. For many synthetic oligonucleotides phosphorothioate linkages are often seen. Linkage connectivity

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Each linkage will be registered as a fragment and have an ID.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Each linkage will be registered as a fragment and have an ID.

name: $::name
desc: Returns: Each linkage will be registered as a fragment and have at least one name. A single name shall be assigned to each linkage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Each linkage will be registered as a fragment and have at least one name. A single name shall be assigned to each linkage.

name: $residueSite
desc: Returns: Residues shall be captured as described in 5.3.6.8.3.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Residues shall be captured as described in 5.3.6.8.3.
